name: Boston Lettuce and Red Onion Salad
keywords: lettuce, red onion, red wine vinegar, raw
recipeIngredient: 1 large or 2 small heads Boston lettuce
1/2 cup finely chopped parsley, preferably flat-leaf Italian parsley

recipeInstructions.text: Cut away the core of the lettuce. Remove the leaves. Rinse and pat dry. Put leaves into a salad bowl and add onion and parsley.
Put the vinegar in a bowl and add salt and pepper. Start beating while gradually adding the oil. Pour the sauce over the salad and toss to blend.
